theDisruptor:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theDisruptor:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theDisruptor:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theDisruptor:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theDisruptor:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theDisruptor:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theDisruptor:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theDisruptor:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theDisruptor:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theDisruptor:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theDisruptor:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theDisruptor:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theDisruptor:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
